definition: to talk crap/to be full of shit
(of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)

sentences.english: That foul mouth stands there bringing more ill fortune with his blasphemies.
sentences.chinese: 那一張臭嘴站在那兒滿嘴噴糞，只能帶來更多惡運。
